channel.title: Mouse Scroll Wheel does not work
channel.description:
Hello together,
my host system is Lubuntu 14.04 and I am using a Logitech G4 USB Mouse. I am using an Whonix with KVM. The mouse wheel does not work inside the virtual machine.
What can I do to fix this?
Thank you.

item.title: Mouse Scroll Wheel does not work
item.dc:creator: HulaHoop
item.description:
Corrections. After researching this some more:

https://packages.debian.org/search?keywords=xserver-xorg-input-evdev-udeb

Whonix does include this package by default as part of xorg.

Only Debian Jessie has the package that has the fix version 2.9.

Debian Wheezy has the problem because its package is 2.7. Whonix 10 is based on Wheezy.

Solution: wait for Whonix 11 thats based on on Jessie to be officially released and this problem will go away or install the RC from the download mirror.
